text: Gradaterebra easmithi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Terebridae, the auger snails.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Gradaterebra easmithi (Aubry, 1999). title: Gradaterebra easmithi
